en.title: Finite Automata Simulator
en.addStateTitle: Add a new state to the automaton
en.removeStateTitle: Delete the selected state of the automaton
en.selfLoopTransitionTitle: Add self-loop transition to a state
en.testFATitle: Test strings for the current automaton
en.alertSelfLoop: Click on a state to add a self-loop
en.alertTransitionAdd: Click on the starting state, then on the ending state
en.alertClear: Are you sure you want to clear the board?
en.footer: An educational tool for designing and testing Finite Automata - Built by Evangelos Georgosoulis - 2025
en.alertEmptyTransitions: Empty symbol transitions are not allowed in DFAs
en.alertNoAutomaton: There is no automaton to be saved
en.alertSameSymbolTransition: A transition with the same symbol already exists from this state
en.alertSimulationFail: Test failed. Unable to communicate with server
en.alertEmptyAutomaton: The automaton is empty or incomplete
en.alertNoInitialState: The automaton must have an initial state
en.alertNoFinalState: The automaton must have at least one final state
en.guestInfo:
You don't need to sign in.
You can continue as a guest user with access to local Save/Load functionality only
en.saveWarning: ğŸ”’To save to server, please log in
en.loadWarning: ğŸ”’To load to server, please login
en.pleaseEnterName: Please enter a name for your automaton
en.saveResponseNotJson: Saved, but response is not JSON
en.mustLoginToLoad: You must be logged in to load from server
en.confirmDeleteAutomaton: Are you sure you want to delete this automaton?
en.promptRenameAutomaton: Enter new name for the automaton:
en.registrationSuccess: Registration successful! You can now log in
